reviews.text:
This was great day out there were many artist working and living in this area. The styles varied but the quality was very good we really wanted to buy some.works.and I think before we Leave Thailand we might come back and buy some.
This place is pretty large and you could spend 1 or 2 hours here easily. There is a cafe here as well so it's a place to grab a bit to eat if your peckish.

A real paradise for arts lovers. The site is wonderful, colorful, bright and quiet. All kind of styles and medium are displayed all over the place in a free way, creating a journey of  delightfull discoveries and surprises. 
The vegetation is a part if the magic there. The artists are accessible and so talented. Its great to see them at work. 
There is also a large and well supplied section dedicated to learning workshops.
The drink and food area, nested on the edge of a water lily pond, is as lovely as the workshop place. This section is open to everyone, no need to enter the artist's village if you only want a nice place to have a drink or a snack.
A must see.

An interesting place to visit for a few hours if you're in the area. The place is pretty quiet during weekends so there's no busy crowd to jostle through the view the art. If you're lucky, you might also catch a few artists working on their latest artwork and strike up a conversation. There is a workshop on site for visitors to try watercolor painting and other crafts. There is no entrance fee and parking is available on site. The nearby 4D art museum is also a great place to drop by for more photo-taking. Remember to bring fan as the weather can get quite hot around noon, and mosquito repellent.

This is a nice place offering a couple of restaurants overlooking a lake. The food was great albeit the noise from the nearby highway.

After the food we paid the small fee for access to the artist village. 

The artwork on display was diverse from paintings to sculptures and some artists could be observed at work.

There is a children activity/craft area which looked like fun. If your children take part be sure to rub some mosquito spray on them as there are plenty about.

It's unique. A lot of interesting to see, nice painting from many artists.
A good place for everyone to enjoy arts especially kids have acitivities to do too.

Good for escaping Hua Hin.
Clean and beautiful view
Good place to get seafood.

Absolutely beautiful and serene beach despite the rainy weather on the day we visited. Quiet, feels local, nice Khao Takiab (Chopstick Mountains) in the background, no touts, clean, and very chill. Recommended!
Nice to have a drink or something to eat
Lots of retired people exposing their ample flesh.

Very quite place. No people around really. Didn't feel like we could climb the steps but you can. The statues are very impressive well worth a 15 minute stop over. If your interested have a good read about who they all are make the experience more enjoyable.
If your going please be respectful and wear long clothing

Rajabhakti park has the big statues of 7 historic kings in Thailand. It is a great place to respect and take a picture with big statues. It would take about half an hour here. At noon, it would be too sunny, so I suggest to come here in the morning.

Please make sure you dress appropriately with long pants.

The parking lot is huge. There are more than enough slot available.
recommended. Took bus to and from for 20+20 baht. Beach is very nice. Lounge chair 20 baht. Great  coffee shop. Clean bathrooms. Lots of room to walk the beach. No garbage on beach.

It's a really big nice space with this beautiful giant statues, I went there cause I rented a bike and it was not far from the bike lane... You just need to cross the road. I had no time to try but I guess it will be very nice to shoot the sunset there, the sun will go down right behind the hill

Very impressive statues and park with a lovely  background of the hills surrounding HauHin. Historical information on all 7 Kings in English and Thai. We went there in late afternoon the sunlight was good to take some nice photos and we missed the heat of mid day. Guided tour around the site in a open bus sadly only in Thai , no audio description available in any other language sadly.
Free Entry and plenty of parking. Dress code is a per temples respectful else you will be provided with a sarong.
Quiet beach. A bit too far from main Hua Hin. No beach chairs. Good relaxing area. Recommend to bring your own drink, mat, umbrella.

Pretty unique set up for the temple. The view is amazing, the temple location is excellent. However, you can tell that it’s not been well maintain which is not a bad thing. I only wish they built less ugly concert fake cave structures. Because the nature is so magnificent, it really doesn’t need those ugly man made structures. However, the. Temple itself is absolutely beautiful. I also love the small fish village right by it.
Wonderful place to visit and good Beach at Sai Noi Beach good restaurant and Pizza
Nice view but don't have a car park
One of my favourite places on Earth

Absolutely beautiful place, full of grace. I came across a group of retired ladies who practiced yoga and other physical exercises. I joined them but wasnt as agile and fit as them. Respect for Thai ladies.

My 3rd time here and It is still fun. The place is clean and well managed, no plastic glass/or bags allowed. Its about 2 km hike up and down on the stone steps. The trail is not so difficult but you should be at least medium fit. The cave is really beautiful especially when the sunlight is shining down to the pavillion. There are quite a few things to explore inside the cave. Can be crowded in long weekends, worth visiting still!

A lovely trek with some beautiful views and a very impressive destination.
Be warned though the trek is up a very steep footpath and can be quite hard going especially in the heat but if you are relatively fit ,have good footwear on and plenty of water it is well worth the effort.

Nice place to hang out with friends.
Be aware of monkeys they will try to steal your belongings.

Entrance ticket cost! Unless you are welling, have time and energy to travel to different parts of the park some area can be reach from another entrance only. One can be seen by extra cost on boat ride (worth it n enjoyable). Lookout point you 've to be prepared to climb steep rocks "stairs".. do pack some easy food.

The only American accredited university in Thailand. If you are looking to work or continue your studies abroad, this is the best place. Teachers here are friendly and professional. Some stuff on the campus definitely needs to be improve, but the university itself is changing everyday. So if you are serious with your studies and want a quality education. I highly recommend this university. You will not be disappointed with your academic papers.

Webster University is a nice place to study. There are many classroom to support students and also have a good an atmosphere to study too.
Staffs are very nice and very helpful. I'm always happy  when I come here.

Webster Chaam is where I studies in 2001. I was there for a year and loved being a student. Small, interactive classes. I had classmates from all over the world. I was fortunate to have an experience like that. 

Many years later, now I am working here and I see several improvements. What was a small town is now almost a metropolis. Chaam Campus of Webster University is a great place for those who like to be in a resort-styled environment, away from the madness of the city. Yet Bangkok is just 2 hours away. 
I highly recommend WUT Chaam campus to you.

One of the best university I've ever heard 
I will try to attend Master degree in this university after I had graduated

reviews.author_name: ชุติมา บูรณะธีรกิจ
reviews.text: A recommended international university for people who want to escape from the vibrant city.

Average.

raw shrimp is fresh. slightly idle as it looks a bit dry.

crab cake tastes ok if you like that sugary sweet thai style.

the clam is so "thin" while the sauce is stronger than it really needs by 3 times.

Leo is the best to neutralize the taste.

environment is pleasant. service is good.

Great place. If you want to eat good Thai food and seafood. Very clean and lovely place. Prices more or less the same than on the seashore. But quality of food higher. If you have possibility to go out of center of Huahin, you must visit this place.

Quality food, especially seafood.  Fresh ingredients with great seasoning & cooking.  Though it locates a bit far away from city centre, worth the visit!  The mouth-watering dishes, comfortable seating, warm & friendly & professional staff....plus super affordable pricing...  all these makes u wanna come back & back again!

Love most the stir fried oyster cake & raw prawns!
Delicious Thai seafood with reasonable price

Delicious seafood with reasonable price
Highly recommend stir fried squid, it really deserves a bowl of rice
OMG loved the ribs. We were very shocked how goof the food was and the lady cooked it in-front of us. My husband even ate the salad they gave us which was a shock to me because he never eats salad.

Rude staff and extremely unpleasant evening. Paid and left. Female manager went out yelling at me in Thai in front of everyone. Turns out she didn’t talk to her staff and didn’t know I have paid. Without even an apology she gave me the devil look and went to back inside and everyone at the street probably thought I just robbed the restrauant. Anyway I went back asked for an apology and she pointed to her waiter and said it’s his fault not mine. 

It wasnt that big deal to be honest.  We are humans and all make mistakes but I never see people in service industry so rude not apologetic especially they indeed did something wrong. Feel quite ironic that the other post mentioned owner treated his dog and staff nicely. How could a manager refuse to apologize for something and blame her waiter in front of everyone. yak. Avoid!
Great ribs good price.
Absolute the very best ribs in Hua Hin.  I also appreciate how the owners treat their staff and even the soi dogs.  Good people, excellent food and, good location.

Happy Pigg
This restaurang is very good, very good food, we recomend it..
